label: update grub
description: update grub to find new kernels and other OS

exec.label: Install
exec.command: run-as-root aptitude -y install cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-rar unrar

undo.label: Remove
undo.command: run-as-root aptitude remove -y cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-rar unrar

status.command: dpkg-query  -l cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-rar unrar
